00013 bool
00014 MMLmn::validate() {
00015         if (validated) {
00016                 return valid;
00017         }
00018         valid = true;
00019         validated = true;
00020         // an mi element may only contain MMLtext elements
00021         MMLNode *n = first;
00022         while (valid && n) {
00023                 valid &= n->isText();
00024                 if (!valid) {
00025                         errmsg = "An mn element may contain only text and no elements.";
00026                 }
00027                 n = getNext(n);
00028         }
00029         return valid;
00030 }
00031 void
00032 MMLmn::doLayout(MML::Attributes *a) const {
00033         if (!first) return;
00034 
00035         first->layout(a);
00036         gui->width = first->getWidth();
00037         gui->ascent = first->getAscent();
00038         gui->descent = first->getDescent();
00039 }
00040 void
00041 MMLmn::doPaint(MML::Attributes *a) const {
